chapter.title: IC2D: Interactive Control and Debugging of Distribution and Eclipse plugin
chapter.para: IC2D is a tool which enables you to launch , monitor and control ProActive distributed and grid application.
You can find it in 2 forms :

listitem.para: An Eclipse plugin . This plugin also proposes functionalities facilitating the development of applications using ProActive (TODO a short list ...).

sect2.title: Launcher in IC2D
sect2.para:
In order to open an XML descriptor select : Launcher > Open an XML file
. Next select your XML file. Then the Launcher pespective will open.
Now, the Launcher perspective is open if it was not open before.
This perspective contains an XML editor, a console, and the list of opened xml descriptors.

To launch the application, you have severals possibilities :
Click on the button of the main menu bar, the file which is in the active editor will be launched.
Select your file in the xml descriptors list, and click on the launch icon in the popup menu.
Select your file in the xml descriptors list, and click on the launch icon on the menu bar of the application list.
You can kill the applications launched from a popup-menu in the "XML descriptors" liste.
To see your launched application, open the "Monitoring perspective" and monitor the corresponding host.

sect2.title: The ProActive Editor
sect2.para: This editor checks coding rules. It informs the developper of error concerning ProActive in his classes and can resolve some of these errors.
